comment.body: If this is your take on woman, shame on you. Sorry but stop this shit man. It's getting stale.
Sorry to hear I misunderstood your quote but I only understand 'Google Deutsch'. Then what is the meaning of your quote? Maybe I missed a previous message but for me there is only this one quote.
@caryoscelus: Forgive my ignorance but the one thing I miss in my stupidity is not the translation of your quote. You post this one quote and then what?

I think I know what you trying to say, what I'm trying to say is stop commenting on woman for good or for worse. There is enough talk about what woman can and can't do. It's all their choice. For what it's worth: I love woman (my wife) if they wear less the better but all in respect. Thanks man for the discussion and your reply's.
